Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Halsted and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Halsted, 115th and over regular route due to street blockage near 115th/Eggleston.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lower Columbus/Lake Street
ShortDescription: Southbound 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Lower Columbus, Lower Wacker Drive, Stetson and South Water: near Lower Columbus/Lake Street .

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Lower Columbus, Lower Wacker Drive, Stetson, South Water and over regular route, due to street blockage near Lower Columbus/Lake Street .

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Washington/Wells
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Washington/Wells due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
